txt.en: Swivelling this mirror back into place should restore a little light to Khazad-dûm. Once finished, you should seek out the dwarf Thettmárr at the Deep Descent.
'You are making Khazad-dûm just a little more habitable every day, [placeholder]. These mirrors will once again light our ancient home.'
The dwarf-mirrors of Khazad-dûm once illuminated the underground halls, but many of them have since fallen into disrepair or were knocked out of alignment.
Talk to Thettmárr at the Deep Descent
Thettmárr is in the Deep Descent.\n\nYou should tell Thettmárr of your continuing efforts towards making Khazad-dûm safe once more.
